tool_description: Validate card numbers with Luhn algorithm
title: Luhn algorithm

api_list.name: Validate card number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://luhn-algorithm.p.rapidapi.com/cardnumber/validate/{number}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "luhn-algorithm.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
